name: Bubble Shooter -Wish to blast all balloon toy
name_original: Bubble Shooter -Wish to blast all balloon toy
description:
Bubble Shooter is a classic and most playful shooting game. Match and pop colorful bubbles and rescue all cute fish and other lovely animals trapped by bubbles over 300 captivating levels. Bubble Shooter, the most played and famous shooting game since the arcade machines age, first choice for your IOS device.

Bubble Shooter Main Features:
●Super easy to pick up and play.
●Play over 300 bubble blasting levels.
●Drag your finger to move the target, aim and shoot!
●Aim carefully and pop 3 more bubbles at a time.
●Rescue lovely fish and animals trapped by colorful bubbles.
●Shoot bubble to clear the same color bubbles to complete the puzzle level.
●Beautiful graphics and animations. Everything is bursting with color.
●Outstanding and cheerful background music.
●With different and addictive levels, your will get more and more interested.
●Powerful boosters like Rainbow and Fire Bubble.


Shooting bubbles has never been this fun. Are you extreme enough to take up the challenge of Bubble Shooter? Download it now and enjoy hours of fun with this classic Bubble Shooter game.
developers: Bubble Blast LTD. - Fun free music games
